58  virtual void RefreshContainers()
59  {
60  const Gwen::Rect& inner = GetInnerBounds();
61  int iOffset = m_Size;
62 
63  if (m_RightSided)
64  iOffset = Height()-m_Size;
65 
66  m_pSplitter->SetSize(inner.w, m_SplitterSize);
67  m_pSplitter->SetPos(0, iOffset);
68  m_Panels[0]->SetPos(inner.x, inner.y);
69  m_Panels[0]->SetSize(inner.w, iOffset);
70  m_Panels[1]->SetPos(inner.x, (iOffset+m_SplitterSize));

72  }
